message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1300000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your offer. However, I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1350000. It's a fair compromise considering the market value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1250000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1380000. It's a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, but I'm still not comfortable with the offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1290000. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1400000. It's a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1275000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand that you've made a final offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than my target price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1420000. It's a fair compromise considering the value of the product.

I understand that we've reached the end of the negotiation, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1260000, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1500000.
